>
[Sap Life](/Feats.aspx?ID=4652) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 115 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You draw the life force out of your enemies. When you cast a [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1552) spell and damage at least one living creature, you regain Hit Points equal to the spell rank of your harm spell. If you aren't a living creature, you gain no benefit from this feat.
name: Sap Life
